refnamediv.refpurpose: Generates a stiifness (connection) mtrix for use in scanu/scanu2.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Generates a stiffness matrix from a text file of triples numbers.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The file named in version 1 or the file stiff.num in the second case is read to create the matrix.

The first line of the file should be
<MATRIX size=integer>
and it creates a square matrix of the indicated size. This is followed by lines of two or three numbers, the first two denoting a connection from the first to the second and the third is a weight. If the third is omitted it is taken as value 1. The list is terminated by a
</MATRIX>
line or end of file.
